title.rendered: Meet Our Team at the IFX EXPO Cyprus 2019!

content.rendered:
May 14th,  2019 The Financial Commission will be exhibiting at the 2019 IFX Expo International which will take place on 21-23 May, 2019 at Spyros Kyprianou Centre, Polemidia, Limassol 3080, Cyprus. Distinguished broker members and interested parties are invited to join Commission representatives at our dedicated booth #78 on the upper floor to discuss Financial Commission’s services for FX and digital asset trading providers.

 

BOOK A MEETING WITH US

 

 

Financial Commission representatives will be ready to showcase our new Membership options for brokers, including Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR), VerifyMyTrade order execution quality certification, Collective Investment Platform certifications and much more. Attendees will also get a demonstration of the Financial Commission website’s ‘Check Your Broker’ directly, which lets traders quickly find all the relevant information about a broker to make better and more informed decisions.

In addition, the Financial Commission expects to meet new market participants who could be potential candidate member firms, including Forex, CFD and digital currency trading providers and Blockchain firms.

Financial Commission Chief Operating Officer, Nikolai Isayev said: “The IFX Expo in Limassol has proven itself to be the key event for Forex and CFD brokers in Europe and we will present our existing and potential members with new services aimed at garnering more trust from traders in the face of expanding regulatory requirements in the region..”

The organization joins a list of more than 2000 attendees, over 40 industry speakers and over 100 confirmed exhibitors and representatives from hundreds of financial services providers starting from the biggest IBs to top-tier retail brokers, asset managers, technology leaders, banks, hedge funds and regtech startups expected to attend the exclusive industry gathering.

About Financial Commission

Founded in 2013, the Financial Commission is a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, CFD and digital currency markets.

Financial Commission provides efficient compliance and certification solutions to its members, alongside its External Dispute Resolution (EDR) mechanism that serves as an effective channel for processing complaints from clients of member firms.

To schedule an appointment with our representatives at the IFX Expo International, please email info@financialcommission.org.
